Quickly became my favorite game. When I first started playing I was legitimately terrified. But now I am loving this so much. I've gotten several friends & family members into the game. Surviving (or dying) with them is so much fun. Killer is just as fun and I love to run killer matches when I need to let off some steam.

I really do want to recommend this game but there are two glaring issues that prevents it, a large percentage of the community is extremely toxic and abusive to each other and hacking is completely out of control and the DbD devs really couldn't care less about moderating their online community in any way. They implemented a reporting system but from all reports i have heard from people in the community the report option is only there to make the person reporting feel like they are accomplishing something and no action is actually ever taken against the toxic players or the hackers. I do enjoy the game and have fun with it about 75% of the time regardless of toxic players but at least 25% of the time the rampant toxicity makes matches completely unfun win or lose and ruins the game and the Developers have literally said that they ignore feedback and reports because they don't care. As much fun as I do have with this game, I cannot justify recommending it until the developers take a stand against the hacking and cheating that is running rampant in the game, even with their unwillingness to do anything about the rampant toxicity it may still warrant a recommend if they would just do something about the cheating and hacking.

The Thing that keeps me into this game, is Micheal Myers, And being tombstoned by Myers, Everything is broken, The Devs dont Care about anything but Money, Releasing New Cosmetics and Killers/Survivors Instead of fixing whats in the game. whats the point of having  PTB if they release it anyways without fixing anything. ( Myers is my favorite killer in the game if that isnt obvious ( pls Tombstone Me )
I like to play this game right before I go to the gym so that I can use the anger I get to increase my lifts. 10/10 would recommend for a pre-workout.
this is the worst and best game i have played in ages. do not install, unless you hate yourself

I've played over 500 hours of this game.
And I'm sorry, but I cannot recommend it. 

The game is too broken in many ways. Especially if you are playing as survivor. 
Most of the games will be ruined by killers who simply decide to be facecamp you as soon as you get hooked.  And if a killer decides to do that, he most often does not need anything else than NOED. 

There is some general balancing that needs to be done. I cannot recommend it until then
